item.title: Perfect Ring prob
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

Not too sure if you can. You can make it have + 99999 stat bonus in all stats, but not hp gain. There’s a command that I have added at the bottom, that gives you 99999 hp (most close you’ll probably get to infinity).

How to have it have + 99999 in all stats:
Open your Item.Cfg located in your Source
Find the Perfect ring (the Item Id is 773)
Replace that line with the following line:
item = 773 ‘perfect’_ring A_perfect_ruby_ring. 1469.99280576915 1469.99280576915 1760.58823743125999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999

Command for 99999 HP:
if (command.startsWith(“heal”)&& playerRights >= 2){
NewHP = 9999999;
playerLevel[3] = 999999;
setSkillLevel(3, 999999, playerLevel[3]);
setAnimation(1500);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

It’s playerRights are set to 2, meaning that you have to be at least an Administrator to use the command.
Player Rights:
0 = Normal Player
1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Co-Owner/Owner
4 = Hidden Administrator
5 (on some servers) = Moderator Crown next you your speech, but Administrator Rights.

Good Luck.
